key.name: idle-dim
key.summary: Dim the screen when the session is idle
key.description: Whether the screen should be dimmed to save power when the session is idle.

key.name: idle-brightness
key.summary: The brightness of the screen when idle
key.description: Laptop panel screen brightness used when the session is idle.

key.name: power-button-action
key.description: The action to take when the system power button is pressed on laptops and desktops. Pressing the power button always correspond to power off on virtual machines and suspend on tablets and smartphones.

key.name: sleep-inactive-ac-timeout
key.summary: Sleep timeout when the computer is on AC power
key.description: Amount of time in seconds the computer on AC power needs to be inactive before it goes to sleep. A value of 0 means never.

key.name: sleep-inactive-ac-type
key.summary: Type of sleeping to perform when the computer on AC power is inactive
key.description: Whether to hibernate, suspend or do nothing when the computer on AC power is inactive.

key.name: sleep-inactive-battery-timeout
key.summary: Sleep timeout when the computer is on battery power
key.description: Amount of time in seconds the computer on battery power needs to be inactive before it goes to sleep. A value of 0 means never.

key.name: sleep-inactive-battery-type
key.summary: Type of sleeping to perform when the computer on battery power is inactive
key.description: Whether to hibernate, suspend or do nothing when the computer on battery power is inactive.
